document_data.name: Kressa Bonedaughter
document_data.mainbody:
'''Kressa Bonedaughter''', who held the title '''Mistress of Souls''', was a devotee of [[Myrkul]], and key member of the [[cult of the Absolute]], who dwelled within [[Moonrise Towers]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{Quote|The most important work, the nature of which I only heard whispers of.|Kressa, speaking of how her studies would be utilized.}}
document_data.Personality: She was wholly devoted to the cult of the Absolute and took great pleasure in her role as its chief vivisectionist.
document_data.Possessions: She wielded an [[item enchantment|enchanted]] [[flail]] known as a ''[[Myrkulite scourge]]''.
document_data.Activities:
Kressa engrossed herself in the work of torture and pseudo-medical experimentation. She became quite knowledgeable about the process of [[ceremorphosis]] and the processes required to inflict it upon other mortals, absent an actual [[mind flayer]].

She was one of the few attendees of Moonrise Towers who was granted permission to conduct business in the illithid colony situated beneath its foundation.
document_data.Relationships:
Kressa followed the direct orders of General [[Ketheric Thorm]], [[chosen]] of Myrkul and one of the three co-conspirators of the [[Absolute crisis]].

She was married to a fellow cultist Myrkulite [[mage]] by the name of [[Maghtew Buj|Maghtew]]. She worked alongside the [[halfling]] cutlist [[Ironfinger]] and [[bugbear]] enforcer [[Hairy Henry]].
document_data.History: Kressa found the [[Bhaalspawn]] known as the [[Dark Urge]] shortly after he was attacked by his subordinate [[Orin]] and infected with a [[mind flayer]] tadpole.
